Package controller

Class GarageHolderController

java.lang.Object
controller.GarageHolderController
public class GarageHolderController extends Object
This class is the controller for the garage holder. It is responsible for the communication between the garage holder and the Company class.

  • Method Details

    • newLogin

      public ArrayList<String[]>[] newLogin(String garageHolder)
      Returns an array consisting of two elements: the first element is a list of pending orders that were not completed. the second element is a list of completed orders.
      Parameters:
      garageHolder - the garage holder to get the orders from
      Returns:
      an array consisting of two elements. the first element is a list of pending orders that were not completed. the second element is a list of completed orders. if there are not any pending orders, the first element is empty. if there are not any completed orders, the second element is empty. if there are not any pending or completed orders, both elements are empty.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given garage holder is null or if the given string is empty or if only whitespace is given

    • wantsToOrder

      public HashSet<String> wantsToOrder()
      Returns the models offered by the car manufacturer.
      Returns:
      The models offered by the car manufacturer.

    • getWorkingMinutesWorkingStation

      public int getWorkingMinutesWorkingStation(String modelName) throws IllegalModelException
      Throws:
      IllegalModelException

    • selectModel

      public TreeMap<String,HashSet<String>> selectModel(String carModel) throws IllegalModelException
      Returns a map of the components and their options for the given model.
      Parameters:
      carModel - The model of the car.
      Returns:
      A map of the components and their options for the given model.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the model is null. If the model is empty. If the model is only whitespace.
      IllegalModelException - If the model is not offered by the car manufacturer.

    • completeOrderingForm

      public String completeOrderingForm(TreeMap<String,String> chosenOptions) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalCompletionDateException, IllegalConstraintException, IllegalModelException, OptionThenComponentException, OptionAThenOptionBException, RequiredComponentException
      Function that accepts a map of specifications, a garage holder name, and a chosen car type. The function generates a new order for the garage holder with the given specifications and adds it to the production queue.
      Parameters:
      chosenOptions - the specifications of the car to order (the specifications must be valid) The function returns the estimated completion time of the order in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss".
      Returns:
      the estimated completion time of the order in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss".
      Throws:
      IllegalCompletionDateException - if the completion date is invalid
      IllegalConstraintException - if there exist constraints not following the correct syntax.
      IllegalModelException - if the chosen model is not offered by the car manufacturer.
      OptionThenComponentException - if there is an option specified but not the implied component.
      OptionAThenOptionBException - if there is an option specified but not the implied option(s).
      RequiredComponentException - if there is a required component not specified.
      IllegalArgumentException

    • viewDetails

      public List<String> viewDetails(int carID, String garageHolderName) throws IllegalArgumentException, OrderNotFoundException
      Returns a list consisting of strings. For a pending CarOrder, these are the specifications, the timestamp of ordering and the estimated production time. For completed orders, these are the specifications, the timestamp of ordering and the timestamp of completion.
      Parameters:
      carID - the id of the order of which the details will be returned
      garageHolderName - the garage holder who ordered the order belonging to the given ID
      Returns:
      set of CarOrders that are pending or completed and ordered by the given garage holder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given ID is not strictly positive or if the given garage holder is null or if the given garage holder is empty or if only whitespace is given
      OrderNotFoundException
